sn51.12:4.1: “Cattārome, bhikkhave, iddhipādā bhāvitā bahulīkatā mahapphalā honti mahānisaṃsā.
sn51.12:4.2: Kathaṃ bhāvitā ca, bhikkhave, cattāro iddhipādā kathaṃ bahulīkatā mahapphalā honti mahānisaṃsā?
sn51.12:4.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu chandasamādhippadhānasaṅkhārasamannāgataṃ iddhipādaṃ bhāveti—
sn51.12:4.4: iti me chando na ca atilīno bhavissati, na ca atippaggahito bhavissati, na ca ajjhattaṃ saṅkhitto bhavissati, na ca bahiddhā vikkhitto bhavissati.
sn51.12:4.6: yathā pure tathā pacchā, yathā pacchā tathā pure;
sn51.12:4.7: yathā adho tathā uddhaṃ, yathā uddhaṃ tathā adho;
sn51.12:4.8: yathā divā tathā rattiṃ, yathā rattiṃ tathā divā.
sn51.12:4.9: Iti vivaṭena cetasā apariyonaddhena sappabhāsaṃ cittaṃ bhāveti.
sn51.12:5.4: iti me vīmaṃsā na ca atilīnā bhavissati, na ca atippaggahitā bhavissati, na ca ajjhattaṃ saṅkhittā bhavissati, na ca bahiddhā vikkhittā bhavissati.
sn51.12:5.6: yathā pure tathā pacchā, yathā pacchā tathā pure;
sn51.12:5.7: yathā adho tathā uddhaṃ, yathā uddhaṃ tathā adho;
sn51.12:5.8: yathā divā tathā rattiṃ, yathā rattiṃ tathā divā.
sn51.12:5.9: Iti vivaṭena cetasā apariyonaddhena sappabhāsaṃ cittaṃ bhāveti.
sn51.12:5.10: Evaṃ bhāvitā kho, bhikkhave, cattāro iddhipādā evaṃ bahulīkatā mahapphalā honti mahānisaṃsā.
sn51.12:6.1: Evaṃ bhāvitesu kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu catūsu iddhipādesu evaṃ bahulīkatesu anekavihitaṃ iddhividhaṃ paccanubhoti—
sn51.12:6.3: yāva brahmalokāpi kāyena vasaṃ vatteti … pe ….
sn51.12:7.1: Evaṃ bhāvitesu kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu catūsu iddhipādesu evaṃ bahulīkatesu, āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharatī”ti.
